title: Draven Draven Axe Emblem
body:
Soul Reaver and Gladiator Draven recently have updated emblem 

http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Vzqhno16p-4/VmdDATICsII/AAAAAAAAJbg/o_HzD21hWcI/s1600/dravennewemblem1.jpg
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-7khT3zVIRIM/VmdDAbGa4eI/AAAAAAAAJbk/VRWoe2jcaiM/s1600/dravennewemblem2.jpg

His 750 rp skin has a unique emblem 
https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-W-KXIWw7I4k/VrOmyNe_pnI/AAAAAAAA3t4/AyA3amp9j6k/s1600/dravencatch.jpg

So can Draven Draven get a unique one too. My proposal is to have the emblem be a Draven face.

http://i.imgur.com/SIJupXo.png

Also Pool Party and Primetime have unique emblem too

http://www.newsoflegends.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Pool-Party-Draven-Q-2.jpg

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-NyzlIx92fbA/U6UxJcF4MkI/AAAAAAAASNk/xdnPIfZcLMI/s1600/qqqqq.jpg

replies.body: Should be Tyler1 face as the ultimate troll

it would inspire me to catch the axes too
so i can step on his face
And I wouldn't feel bad for missing them 'cause the axes would always hit the face :^)
it was 5000 RP I expect at least an emblem...
No no no and no, the Draven face icon, skin and everything about Draven day is horrible, I never want to be reminded of this monstrosity again. ):

i mean i liked it. It wasnt all that bad i just wished it would have been delivered in another time instead of the time where urf was expected, althoughhhh riot said over a 1000 times its not coming on april 1st but some people are just to ignorant for their overated urf.

I wasn't one of the "Urf urf urf" I was one of the, I can't wait to see what surprise is in store since they said U.R.F won't be coming, I personally think the rotating queue was a great idea, I just really didn't like Draven day because it legitimately killed the meme for me. :/

> [{quoted}](name=Monkey D Luffy,realm=OCE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=Hh47tlna,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-05-02T01:11:47.645+0000)
>
> No no no and no, the Draven face icon, skin and everything about Draven day is horrible, I never want to be reminded of this monstrosity again.

someone's salty about urf

the truth has been spoken

Downvote me now

it was better than urf ever was.
We need more quality posts such as this on the boards
Whats they point in having a banned skin that no one can buy?
